articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Doc™
One of the greatest resources I've come across in the Web3 Space is @developer_dao.
When you've got massive talents like @dabit3, @camiinthisthang, and so many others in the DAO, you know great things are happening within.
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): On D_D YouTube channel there is a lot of knowledge to be found! 🤓
Do you still remember the third workshop on fundraising made by D_D Fundraising Operators @mr_cgc & @Wikist_? 👀
Present Your Path to Sustainability and Scale
If you missed it:
 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z0xqty_fvJg
